subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Marion Bartoli, the No. 15 seed from France, won her first Grand Slam title, beating Sabine Lisicki in the women’s singles final at Wimbledon.
snippet: Marion Bartoli, the No. 15 seed from France, won her first Grand Slam title, beating Sabine Lisicki in the women’s singles final at Wimbledon.
